|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 320 |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320DBTI-70G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM639165TS-6G; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:22:2D |oui = 00:22:2D |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;3.3;Ralink; |stockos = Linux;2.6.21;; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |serial = yes,, 5-pin header,, internal,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = boot log |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2597L;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = smcadmin |defaultssid = SMCWBR14S-N4_AP |defaultssid_regex = ^SMCWBR14S-N4_AP$ |default_ch = |manuf = AWB |manuf_model = WR6205 |manuf_rev = T01 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt, (w/ severe limitations) |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/27/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B002ZDGJX2 |asin_country = US |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141000000018W REV:R01" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM [[AWB]] WR6205-T01 ([[Accton]] Wireless Broadband) The power adapter included with the device is a PSA15-10U (5V, 1A). ===Third party firmware notes=== will require serial access *'''DD-WRT''' can apparently run to some extent w/ a 16MiB RAM :tailored build for the ESR-9752 (see below links) *'''OpenWrt''' will work on the device (the WR-6202 build seems OK), :but 16MiB isn't sufficient for most use cases - you will :certainly need to compile a pared down build ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=506719 On the '''DD-WRT''' Forums] **[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=658444 and again, hotlinking my images this time] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts====

|
|             [VCC] (Rx) (Tx) (GND) [UNU]
|

| |      |
